title: Foxtail Games
longDescription: When I was a junior in college I started Foxtail Games. During my time as CEO I developed multiple apps, deployed them on the App Store, and got thousands of downloads. We also won a number of entrepreneurial pitch competitions.

title: Bloveit
longDescription: Between Junior and Senior year of college I joined Bloveit as their lead developer. It was my first experience as a contract worker, and I successfully developed a fully functional iOS App for them.

title: Apple
longDescription: I got a job at Apple through an incredibly difficult series of events, from sponsored Hackathons to international competitions. Eventually I started work as an iOS developer in 2017, and have prototyped, built, tested, and maintained a myriad of apps for Apple.

title: X-Team?
longDescription: Hey did you actually run this app? Or even look this far into the code? I'm impressed! I didn't expect you to. Well that's pretty cool. Text me and let's chat. 678-447-4380
